episode_event_valentine_2025/4001_1001_0:
How’s everyone doing on the sweets-making
front? On track to hand them out on
Palentine’s Day?

After Serena and Dawn taught us how to
make ’em, Bea and I practiced together!
Now we can make sweets all by ourselves.

You’re both sweets makers in your own right,
now!

Hehe, all the sweets sound amazing! I can’t wait
to see the final result!
Oh, hi, Marley! What’re you doing here?
Planning to do something for Palentine’s Day, too?
episode_event_valentine_2025/4001_1001_1: I was hoping to give Elesa and Marnie presents...
Yeah... They both gave me courage...

And helped me change for the better...
At least a little.
Wanna make sweets with everyone, then?

Oh, um... If possible, I want to give them
something different...
They’ll probably get plenty of sweets from others.
But I’m not sure what would be good...
episode_event_valentine_2025/6801_1001_0: I love the smell of flowers...

When I feel tired, I just take in the scent, and
before I know it... Zzz... Zzz...
episode_event_valentine_2025/4002_1001_0: Isn’t it pretty? You can find tons of flowers here!

Grass-type users come together to take care of
all of them!
They look after all these flowers?
Look at this one. It’s so big and pretty...
episode_event_valentine_2025/4002_1001_1: Ehehe, looks like we startled you. Sorry.
She’s not a flower—she’s my partner, Lurantis.

That really made me jump... I didn’t realize it was
a Pokémon...

Lurantis is a Grass-type Pokémon, and she’s as
charming as a flower.

When I first met her, she was nestled among some
flowers, just as she is now.
I’ve been taking care of her ever since.

Back then, she hadn’t evolved yet. She was just a
little Fomantis hidin’ in some flowers we’d ordered.
Don’t you think Erika’s Lurantis is beautiful?

It’s hard to keep their colors as beautiful as hers,
right?
episode_event_valentine_2025/4002_1001_2:
Indeed! It takes a lot of time, effort, and love to
maintain Lurantis’s vivid colors.

If you just raised a Lurantis normally, it’d never
turn out as gorgeous as this.

Well it’s clear how much Erika cherishes
her Lurantis!

Perhaps Lurantis blooms this beautifully as a way
of saying thanks!

You may be right—the more you care for both
flowers and Pokémon, the more beautiful
they become.
I think that’s their way of expressing gratitude.

If you want to send a gift of gratitude on
Palentine’s Day, flowers might be good.

Mallow... When you said you have an idea,
did you mean—
episode_event_valentine_2025/4002_1001_3: Yup! I figured bouquets would make perfect gifts!
Oh, is there someone you want to thank?
I want to thank them for giving me courage...

Could you come with me? There’s something I’d
like to give you.

It’s a gift from me to you, to show my support.
Since you’re such a kind person!
episode_event_valentine_2025/4003_1001_0:
Gracidea bouquets are often given to convey
gratitude on special occasions, like birthdays or
anniversaries.

I actually wanted to make one myself, but it’s hard
to get ahold of real Gracidea flowers on Pasio.

But hopefully at least this outfit can help you
express your feelings, Marley!
It’s amazing... Are you sure I can keep it?
episode_event_valentine_2025/4003_1001_1:
All righty, then! How ’bout we put our heads
together and decide on the bouquets we ought to
make, eh?
Marley, do you like any particular flowers?

Not really... I don’t really know much about
flowers, to be honest...

Then why don’t you pick flowers that the people
you want to give them to like?

I guess you could ask Marnie’s brother, Piers,
what kind of flowers she’d like.

And for Elesa... Hmm. I know what kind of FOOD
she likes, but...
episode_event_valentine_2025/4003_1001_2: Well, ain’t that a cute little critter!
It looks like a Grass-type Pokémon...right?

I saw hers when she was working as a tourism
ambassador, but it looked kinda different.
I’ve heard Shaymin has two different forms.

Oh yeah, Elio and Selene said Rosa mentioned
something like that, too!
So you really think that Pokémon’s a Shaymin?
It keeps looking at us. I wonder why.
episode_event_valentine_2025/4003_1001_3: Hey, what kinda Pokémon is Shaymin?

People say Shaymin are associated with feelings
of gratitude.

Perhaps it was drawn to Marley. That might be
why it came so close.
Yes, I think it sensed your feelings of gratitude.
episode_event_valentine_2025/4004_1001_0:
Have you collected all the flowers you need,
Marley?

Yeah, I was able to find the ones you told
me about.

We have almost all the materials we need for
the bouquets.

Oh, um... I was wondering if Shaymin was still
around somewhere.
That Shaymin is still on your mind, isn’t it.
episode_event_valentine_2025/4004_1001_1:
If it wanted to be left alone, I don’t think it
would’ve shown itself.
I’d say it’s definitely curious about you, Marley.
(Maybe Shaymin doesn’t know what to do either.)
episode_event_valentine_2025/4005_1001_0:
Now you’ve all the flowers you need for
the bouquets!
All I need to do is give these to them...
Marley, let’s ask Lurantis to help us.

Lurantis can coax other Pokémon to come closer
by giving off a scent of sweet flowers.
She might be able to make Shaymin less wary.
episode_event_valentine_2025/4005_1001_1:
Aw, that’s a shame. It didn’t seem to have
much effect.
I wonder why Shaymin won’t come closer.
Shaymin is kinda how I was a while ago...

I found it really hard to speak... I didn’t want to
hurt anyone’s feelings by saying something wrong,
so I kept my mouth shut...

But to tell the truth, I was just afraid of my own
feelings being hurt...
I didn’t want anyone to dislike me...

I thought it better to do nothing—better to stay the
way I was—than to risk getting hurt.
episode_event_valentine_2025/4005_1001_2: Maybe Shaymin feels the same way...

It wants to come closer, but every time it does,
it’s unsure and afraid. Bittersweet, isn’t it?
I wonder if there’s anything we can do to help.

We can’t force it to do anything, but we can give
it courage...
Just like Elesa and Marnie gave to me...
You don’t have to be afraid to express yourself.
Would you mind if...if I practiced smiling with you?
episode_event_valentine_2025/4005_1001_3:
Please do! Can I ask ya for some advice while
you’re here?
(And Marnie accepted me for who I was...)

Now it’s my turn. I want to give courage
to Shaymin.

I want it to see how much fun it can be to spend
time with someone!
So, I’ll express my gratitude to Elesa and Marnie...

And I’ll show Shaymin how I can share my feelings
with them!
Ehehe, you’re very kind, Marley. Just as I thought.
I’ll craft the perfect bouquets for you!
episode_event_valentine_2025/4006_1001_0:
You have a serious look on your face. Must be
something important.

Um, so... I wanted to tell you both how happy
I was.
episode_event_valentine_2025/4006_1001_1:
Elesa, when I couldn’t express my feelings well,
you gave me words of encouragement.
I’m now able to express myself, even just a little...

You accepted me when I finally tried to open up a
little, and you practiced smiling with me.

Thanks to both of you, I was able to change for
the better...
So...here’s something special for my friends...

Nooo, thank YOU for bein’ my friend!
I’m super happy!
episode_event_valentine_2025/4006_1001_2:
Let’s keep hangin’ out together and practicin’
our smiles!
How are you feeling now, Marley?
(And the flowers around us do, too.)
episode_event_valentine_2025/4007_1101_0: A few days after Palentine’s Day...
episode_event_valentine_2025/4007_1001_0:
That’s great! I’m glad you could tell them both
how you feel!
It was thanks to all your help!

Now it’s my turn to help you all. Let’s make a
beautiful flower field together!

Oh, by the way, did you make friends with
Shaymin?
I’m afraid not... I haven’t seen it since...
I s’pose Shaymin’s got its reasons.
Yeah! I bet it’ll visit you again soon!
episode_event_valentine_2025/4007_1001_1:
And when it does, you should welcome it with a
big, open heart!
Go on, Marley! Go greet it!
I think Shaymin needed some time to itself.

It needed to develop its own courage after you
inspired it.

And now its mind is made up. That’s why it came
to visit you.
episode_event_valentine_2025/4007_1001_2: Both Marley and Shaymin look so happy!

Seems they were able to show each other how
they feel.

Um, we’re actually going to make a flower
field here.
Would you like to help us, Shaymin?
